title: Riccardo Bonetto
text:
Riccardo Bonetto (born 20 March 1979 in <a href="Asolo">Asolo</a>, <a href="Province%20of%20Treviso">Treviso</a>) is an Italian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> of <a href="Bassano%20Virtus%2055%20S.T.">Bassano Virtus</a>.
Career.
He also played at Serie A level with <a href="Empoli%20F.C.">Empoli</a> and <a href="A.S.%20Livorno%20Calcio">Livorno</a>. Bonetto was sold to Empoli in <a href="co-ownership%20%28football%29">co-ownership</a> deal in 2001 from Juve, for €516,000. In June 2003 Juventus gave up the remain registration rights to Empoli.
